field.passwordConfirmation.helper: Please re-enter your password to confirm it.
field.passwordConfirmation.label: Confirm password
field.password.label: Password
meta.title: Complete registration
submit.error.alreadyTaken.text: An account with the source email already exists. This means your link has probably already been used. You may try logging in instead.
submit.error.text: An unknown error occurred during registration. You may try again later.
submit.error.title: Registration failed.
submit.error.unauthorized.text: You are not allowed to create an account with the provided information. The link you are trying to use may have expired or is invalid, or has already been used.
success.sub: You may now close this page, or proceed to your account page. You are already logged in so no further action is required.
success.title: Registration successful!
title: Complete registration
